meta.description: Language labels for backend module Media Backend belonging to extension 'media'

languageKey.label: Media Backend
Media Backend
Configuration is still missing. Update Extension Manager Configuration
No Storage has been defined yet. Please create one to have Media running.
It is very likely Media is being set up for the first time. Check out the options bellow and click the "Update" button to save your configuration.
Media is correctly configured
Updater Script
UUID fields are OK and values have been successfully checked
Some table(s) are missing
While checking the system, it has been detected some table(s) are missing. You should open up the Install tool and run the "Compare" tool under "Database Analyser"
